post:
Hello,

We are happy to announce the launch of next-generation SSD VPS Hosting - [rootwelt#](http://en.rootwelt.de)

**Includes:**

- Pure 100% **SSD RAID-10** @Adaptec controllers
- Premium SuperMicro **Xeon E5** Platforms
- **Xen virtualization**, resources are guaranteed
- **Tier III+** Data-center - Global Switch, Frankfurt-am-Main
- The full control on your VPS from billing panel
- **4 CPU** Cores for each VPS

**Price**

- 1GB RAM + 20GB SSD Storage - **5**€/mo


[Sign up now!](http://en.rootwelt.de)

**Datacenter**

- Test IP - 62.113.208.1
- Test File - http://lg.rootwelt.de/100MBtest.zip

**rootwelt#**
